items.title: customer-first
items.content: Everything we do, we do it with the customer in mind. If it doesn’t make the customer happy,it doesn’t happen—end of story

items.title: Integrity
items.content: To us, integrity is a combination of truth, transparency, bravery, and common sense. We will always fight for what we believe in.

items.title: Open
items.content: At Vibe, everyone is a beginner. We strive to unlearn our pre-conditioned ideas.We’re always open to diverse perspectives and new challenges.

items.title: Passion
items.content: Our destiny is to build great products for our customers. We are proud of what we do,unwaveringly curious, and unbelievably passionate.
